item.description:
[b[i]]"THE LARGEST & BEST SINGLES DANCE ORGANIZATION IN NEW ENGLAND."

Friday, FEBRUARY 19, at RAFFAEL’S, 1601 Main St., Rte. 1A, Walpole. (508)668-8071
www.se-4u.com.
Dancing with music by award-winning DJ from 8:00-12:00 AM.
Complimentary buffet all night, free door prizes, and MATCH GAME prizes.
Hundreds of singles and couples, 35-60 years old.
Cost is $12 ALL NIGHT.
Proper business dress required, sports jacket, or tie, for men highly recommended; business or party finery for women.
Info, call (781)446-0234.
Co-sponsored by Rhode Island’s Most Eligible Singles and THE SINGLE CEO CLUB: www.singleceos.com.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Pam at the door.
item.name: "THE SINGLE EXECUTIVES CLUB" SINGLES DANCE
